sentences.english: That thunderstorm the other night frightened little Tom half to death.
sentences.chinese: 前两天晚上的那场雷雨把小汤姆吓得半死。

sentences.english: The boy was frightened into obedience.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩给吓得服服帖帖。

sentences.english: My skin crawled when I heard a sudden shriek in the dead of night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚万籁俱寂时突然听到一声尖叫，吓得我汗毛直竖。

sentences.english: He looked so disconsolate that it scared her.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去情绪很坏，吓了她一跳。

sentences.english: The girl frightened trembles , said that got rid the serial number.
sentences.chinese: 女孩吓得哆哆嗦嗦，说出了手机号。

sentences.english: She stared towards them and they ran to his car and sped off.
sentences.chinese: 她紧盯着他们，他们俩吓得赶紧跑进车开走了。

sentences.english: Tracy was scared by Artest for the last several plays.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰斯特最后几次的表现，麦迪好像被吓到了。

sentences.english: The Qiao son really thinks cachinnation, although she is terrified to horrify this to adopt to spend a thief.
sentences.chinese: 巧儿很想大笑，不过她怕吓到了这个采花贼。

sentences.english: Then I was scared awoken. I know that in the world there is no magic pen.
sentences.chinese: 然后我就被吓醒了，我知道世界上根本没有魔笔。

sentences.english: In my childhood, I used to frighten little sister by telling her a wolf was coming.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我总告诉妹妹狼来了，把她吓得直哭。

sentences.english: I was so scared that my blood ran cold .
sentences.chinese: 我真是给吓得手脚冰冷，魂不附体。

sentences.english: You chose that because you want to frighten me.
sentences.chinese: 你选了那个数字是因为你想要吓我。

sentences.english: The first bird to eat this repellant move about nervously and frightening away the rest.
sentences.chinese: 第一只鸟吃了这种药剂后就会乱跳飞鸣把其它鸟吓走。

sentences.english: "What is Hollywood culture?" Wen Xianglin saw Wen Xiang had become righteously indignant , and this so alarmed her that she was unsure what to do.
sentences.chinese: 文湘琳见文祥慷慨激昂的样子，吓得有点不知所措。

sentences.english: I would knock the door, but you might be scared.
sentences.chinese: 我想叩门，却怕你被我吓着。

sentences.english: The men were cowed into total submission.
sentences.chinese: 这些人被吓得服服贴贴。
